evidence.text: Person B: I love you, you cow.

Person A: Laszlo, I know. I know. I know everything. You see, I became sick. Very sick. I could hardly breathe. I yearned to be with you and it made me sick. I almost died. Between life and death, I began having fantasies about you but I realized they were not fantasies at all, but visions! I was with you. All the time I was with you.
Person A: Laszlo, I know what you've done. I'm not jealous because I was with you the all the time. I know everything that has happened to you, and I am here now and I will never leave you.
Person B: Oh god! MY LOVE. MY LOVE!     I CANNOT

Person B: I am forfeiting the remainder of my fee due to some expenses unforeseen.
Person B: -your salary?

Person B: Oh, I'm just looking at you.
Person A: Yes. Inside, you must look upwards.

Person A: It's too much!
Person A: The pain is too much. I need Zsofia! She has my medication.
Person B: Please. Zsofia, go ahead.

Person B: I don't like that man.
Person B: He dropped you as quickly as he took you on.

Person A: It's not just this trip. You'll be at Doylestown again now... I'll be fine on my own.
Person A: Promise you won't let it drive you mad.
Person A: Your childish show-boating puts everyone else here at risk! Are you thick?! Are you lame?! You report to the subcontractor. You tell him that you've been let go.
Person B: Gordon, can you get him to stop shouting at everyone?

Person A: Speak for yourself! I am NOT finished. Living with you is impossible. You've become a selfish old bastard right before my very eyes!
Person A: You would never do that.
Person A: You poor man. My poor husband. What's been robbed of you-
Person A: Do you have more?
Person B: I love you.

Person B: Shh. You'll feel better soon, just listen to my voice, dear.
Person A: Keep going. Harder.

Person A: What did you do to me, my Laszlo?
Person A: Do you remember everything you confessed to me at home in our bed?
Person A: You needn't be ashamed, my darling. The harm done unto us were done only to our physical bodies.
